title: Final1stspy
descrption: Final1stspy is a dropper family that has been used to deliver DOGCALL.[1]

references.title: Grunzweig, J. (2018, October 01). NOKKI Almost Ties the Knot with DOGCALL: Reaper Group Uses New Malware to Deploy RAT. Retrieved November 5, 2018.

related.Name: Deobfuscate/Decode Files or Information
related.Use: Final1stspy uses Python code to deobfuscate base64-encoded strings.[1]

related.Name: Obfuscated Files or Information
related.Use: Final1stspy obfuscates strings with base64 encoding.[1]

related.Name: Process Discovery
related.Use: Final1stspy obtains a list of running processes.[1]

related.Name: Registry Run Keys / Startup Folder
related.Use: Final1stspy creates a Registry Run key to establish persistence.[1]

related.Name: System Information Discovery
related.Use: Final1stspy obtains victim Microsoft Windows version information and CPU architecture.[1]
